faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Can’t find an answer to your question? Feel free to contact us

faqs.question: What is DegenPad?
faqs.answer: It is a platform for incubating promising projects that are looking to introduce a token into their systems and launching them via IDOs.

faqs.question: What is an IDO?
faqs.answer:
IDO stands for Initial DEX Offering. It is a method of public fundraising that pools capital from retail users by utilizing a decentralized platform as the venue for facilitating the transactions.

This model is superior to the preceding ICO model because the platform can provide a higher degree of security for end users by collecting the funding and only releasing to the projects after the satisfaction of a certain criteria.

faqs.question: What is CrowdFunding / Private Sale?
faqs.answer:
The crowdfunding/private sale is a very early round of fundraising that takes place right before an IDO.

Typically just a day or so before an IDO launch. These rounds tend to offer superior rates but also incur prolonged vesting periods.

faqs.question: What is FCFS or First Comes First Serve round?
faqs.answer:
FCFS is the acronym for First-Come-First-Serve, and it refers to the round of fundraising that becomes available to the general public after the guaranteed round.

As the name might suggest, FCFS rounds are based on timing, available token supplies are sold to participants that arrive ahead of others.

faqs.question: Can I participate in IDOs right after purchasing $CGPT?
faqs.answer:
Almost. Before being able to participate in the IDO’s users must do two more actions.

First, once $CGPT is acquired, users must make sure to have enough tier points for inclusion, if yes, then simply staking their tokens in the official Staking Dashboard

Second, they must pass KYC http://url.degenpad.com/kyc

faqs.question: Is there a refund policy?
faqs.answer: Yes. Every IDO launch will have a “refund grace period” lasting 7–14 days on average that allows participating users added time to evaluate their decisions before finalizing the commitments.

faqs.question: Do I have to KYC in order to access the Launchpad?
faqs.answer: Yes. KYC is required for participating at any tier level. The KYC process has been made maximally simple through our partner Blockpass. To sign up please follow our official link: http://url.degenpad.com/kyc

faqs.question: How is pool weight calculated?
faqs.answer:
Pool weight is calculated based on the distribution of tier points among participating members and their corresponding tier levels.

Every pool has a structured base range that is dependent on their staking tier points.

Ape | 1x | 2,000 points — 19,999 points Chad | 4x — 9.99x | 20,000 points — 49,999 points Shark | 10x — 39.99x | 50,000 points — 199,999 points Whale | 40x + | 200,000 points +

The pool weight indicates how much multiplier is applied to that specific teir level’s allocation capacity.

Ape maintains a base level of 1x multiplier throughout its entire point range. The Chad, Shark, and Whale levels pool weights are scaled proportionally to the individual stakers point position within its range. To best understand the mechanism is through an empirical example:

In the event of a Chad tier with 20,000 points, they have a 4x multiplier. In the event of a Chad tier with 35,000 points, they have a 7x multiplier. In the event of a Chad tier with 49,999 points, they have a 9.99x multiplier.

This logic applies to the Shark tier equally.

Given that Whale level can theoretically have no point limit, the cap on the multiplier for them is logarithmically relational to the total IDO’s upper bound.

faqs.question: What crypto tokens can be used to participate in IDOs?
What countries are restricted from IDOs?
faqs.answer:
Persons from the United States and Canada cannot participate in any IDO due to the lack of clear regulations in the crypto space.

Countries restricted or sanctioned include: Afghanistan, Algeria, American Samoa, Bangladesh, Bolivia, Botswana, Central African Republic, China, Cuba, Democratic People’s Republic of Korea (North Korea), Hong Kong, Egypt, Ethiopia, Ghana, Guam, Iran, Iraq, Libya, Morocco, Nepal, Nigeria, Pakistan, Panama, Puerto Rico, Samoa, South Sudan, Sri Lanka, Sudan, Syria, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, US Virgin Islands, Venezuela, and Yemen.

faqs.question: Can I stake into multiple Pools and still acquire points?
faqs.answer:
Yes. If you wish to split up your $CGPT stake across different pools, then the Launchpad will calculate your point based on their individual placements.

As an example, if you stake 2,500 $CGPT into 45 day pool for 2,500 points and 2,500 $CGPT into the 180 day pool for 3,750 points then your associated wallet will be attributed the aggregated 6,250 tier points.

faqs.question: What is the absolute minimum number of $CGPT that must be staked in order to acquire a Tier status?
faqs.answer:
The entry level tier is Ape, it requires 2,000 points.

Based on the maximum multiplier of 2x for the 365 day staking pool, the minimal number of tokens require is 1,000 $CGPT.

faqs.question: How are Tier Points calculated?
faqs.answer:
Tier points are calculated based on two simple factors; the number of tokens staked and the duration of the staking pool they are allocated to.

1 $CGPT = 1 point

45 day = 1 : 1 points, 90 days = 1 : 1.3 points, 180 days = 1 : 1.5 points, 365 days = 1 : 2 points, 700 days = 1 : 3 points,

So 1,000 $CGPT in 180 day pool would yield 1,500 points.

faqs.question: How many different tiers are there?
faqs.answer: There are four tiers in the launchpad system, Ape, Chad, Shark, and Whale. To understand how tier levels are calculated, please refer to our dedicated post: DegenPad — Tier System & Staking

faqs.question: What does Allocation Multiplier mean?
faqs.answer: The allocation multiplier specifies the amount of tokens that participants will be able to purchase at the different tier levels. Every tier has its own corresponding allocation multiplier, Ape: 1, Chad: 4+, Shark: 10+, Whale 40+.

faqs.question: Can any category of project apply for listing?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely! Innovators from all sectors of the digital economy are invited to apply.

faqs.question: Is there a criteria that must be met in order to list?
faqs.answer: Yes. DegenPad upholds high quality standards that must be met in order for a project to be given access to the LaunchPad.

faqs.question: What is the onboarding process for applying?
faqs.answer: After submitting an application, they will undergo an initial screening by the DegenPad Team. Following the screening, projects will be put through an in depth due-diligence process.

faqs.question: What is the max cap on what projects can raise during IDO?
faqs.answer: The max cap is $15M. For a bigger cap, please consider applying to ChainGPT Pad.
